parameters:
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Beyond here is Lord Zuuteruka's office. He's also the
commander of this garrison... Make sure to watch your words
and actions carefully.

\C[1]■Request Details: Miscellaneous■Requester: The Sojourning
Painter\C[0] Assistance with creative work, report to the
requester staying on the second floor of the tavern.

\C[1]■Request Details: Miscellaneous■Requester: The Sojourning
Painter\C[0]Assistance with creative works, report to the
requester staying on the second floor of the tavern.

\C[1]■Request Details: Business Assistance■Requester: Tavern
Master\C[0]Simple business assistance in the operation of
the tavern.

\C[1]■Request Details: Business Assistance■Requester: Tavern
Master\C[0]Simple business assistance in the operation of
the tavern.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Here we have a request board set up by the residents and our
Ryuda soldiers.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>You cannot undertake multiple requests at the same time.
Also, you cannot accept other requests until you complete
the one you've undertaken and the date changes.
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Leave, the office is currently off-limits.
